_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_OFFER_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (OFFER_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (OFFER_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_OFFER_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT O.OFFER_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, (SELECT MAX(O.PRECEDENCE) MAX_PRECEDENCE, O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, TRADEPOSCN T, CATGRPTPC C, STORECENT S, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE T.TRADEPOSCN_ID = C.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND C.STORE_ID = S.STOREENT_ID AND O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = T.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = S.CATENTRY_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = CE.CATENTRY_ID AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 AND (O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IN (1, 0) OR O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IS NULL) GROUP BY O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID ) FILTER WHERE O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = FILTER.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = FILTER.CATENTRY_ID AND O.PRECEDENCE = FILTER.MAX_PRECEDENCE AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 UNION ( SELECT O.OFFER_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, (SELECT MAX(O.PRECEDENCE) MAX_PRECEDENCE, O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, TRADEPOSCN T, CATGRPTPC C, STORECENT S, TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE T.TRADEPOSCN_ID = C.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND C.STORE_ID = S.STOREENT_ID AND O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = T.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = S.CATENTRY_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = CE.CATENTRY_ID AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 AND (O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IN (1, 0) OR O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IS NULL) GROUP BY O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID ) FILTER WHERE O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = FILTER.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = FILTER.CATENTRY_ID AND O.PRECEDENCE = FILTER.MAX_PRECEDENCE AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 ) ORDER BY OFFER_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), PRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: select o.catentry_id catentry_id, p.currency currency, p.price price from offerprice p, TI_OFFER_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# o, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE where p.offer_id = o.offer_id AND p.currency in (?currencyCode?) AND CE.CATENTTYPE_ID <> 'BundleBean' AND CE.CATENTRY_ID=o.catentry_id UNION ( select o.catentry_id catentry_id, p.currency currency, p.price price from offerprice p, TI_OFFER_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# o, TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE where p.offer_id = o.offer_id AND p.currency in (?currencyCode?) AND CE.CATENTRY_ID=o.catentry_id ) order by catentry_id, price desc, currency

_config:property.name: currencyCode
_config:property.value: USD, EUR, CAD, CNY, JPY, KRW, BRL, TWD, PLN, RON, RUB, EGP, GBP, TRY, ILS

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_BUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), PRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_BUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(OP.PRICE_USD) PRICE_USD, SUM(OP.PRICE_EUR) PRICE_EUR, SUM(OP.PRICE_CAD) PRICE_CAD, SUM(OP.PRICE_CNY) PRICE_CNY, SUM(OP.PRICE_JPY) PRICE_JPY, SUM(OP.PRICE_KRW) PRICE_KRW, SUM(OP.PRICE_BRL) PRICE_BRL, SUM(OP.PRICE_TWD) PRICE_TWD, SUM(OP.PRICE_PLN) PRICE_PLN, SUM(OP.PRICE_RON) PRICE_RON, SUM(OP.PRICE_RUB) PRICE_RUB, SUM(OP.PRICE_EGP) PRICE_EGP, SUM(OP.PRICE_GBP) PRICE_GBP, SUM(OP.PRICE_TRY) PRICE_TRY, SUM(OP.PRICE_ILS) PRICE_ILS FROM TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ITEM, CATENTREL, TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# OP WHERE CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=ITEM.CATENTRY_ID AND ITEM.CATENTRY_ID=OP.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID='BUNDLE_COMPONENT' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# BUNDLE WHERE BUNDLE.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT ORDER BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5) , PRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), PRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(OP.PRICE_USD) PRICE_USD, SUM(OP.PRICE_EUR) PRICE_EUR, SUM(OP.PRICE_CAD) PRICE_CAD, SUM(OP.PRICE_CNY) PRICE_CNY, SUM(OP.PRICE_JPY) PRICE_JPY, SUM(OP.PRICE_KRW) PRICE_KRW, SUM(OP.PRICE_BRL) PRICE_BRL, SUM(OP.PRICE_TWD) PRICE_TWD, SUM(OP.PRICE_PLN) PRICE_PLN, SUM(OP.PRICE_RON) PRICE_RON, SUM(OP.PRICE_RUB) PRICE_RUB, SUM(OP.PRICE_EGP) PRICE_EGP, SUM(OP.PRICE_GBP) PRICE_GBP, SUM(OP.PRICE_TRY) PRICE_TRY, SUM(OP.PRICE_ILS) PRICE_ILS FROM TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CHILD, DKPDCCATENTREL, DKPDCCOMPLIST, TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# OP WHERE CHILD.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCOMPLIST.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID AND OP.CATENTRY_ID=CHILD.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCATENTREL.SEQUENCE=0 AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# DYNAMICKIT WHERE DYNAMICKIT.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID AND DYNAMICKIT.CATENTTYPE_ID='DynamicKitBean' ) GROUP BY DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID) UNION (SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(OP.PRICE_USD) PRICE_USD, SUM(OP.PRICE_EUR) PRICE_EUR, SUM(OP.PRICE_CAD) PRICE_CAD, SUM(OP.PRICE_CNY) PRICE_CNY, SUM(OP.PRICE_JPY) PRICE_JPY, SUM(OP.PRICE_KRW) PRICE_KRW, SUM(OP.PRICE_BRL) PRICE_BRL, SUM(OP.PRICE_TWD) PRICE_TWD, SUM(OP.PRICE_PLN) PRICE_PLN, SUM(OP.PRICE_RON) PRICE_RON, SUM(OP.PRICE_RUB) PRICE_RUB, SUM(OP.PRICE_EGP) PRICE_EGP, SUM(OP.PRICE_GBP) PRICE_GBP, SUM(OP.PRICE_TRY) PRICE_TRY, SUM(OP.PRICE_ILS) PRICE_ILS FROM TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# PDC, CATENTREL, TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# OP WHERE CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT=PDC.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=OP.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID='PDK_COMPONENT' GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_PARENT

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CNTRPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRICE CLOB, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CNTRPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#
